#define final (   a,
  b,
  c 
)
Value:
{ \
    c ^= b; c -= rot(b,14); \
    a ^= c; a -= rot(c,11); \
    b ^= a; b -= rot(a,25); \
    c ^= b; c -= rot(b,16); \
    a ^= c; a -= rot(c,4);  \
    b ^= a; b -= rot(a,14); \
    c ^= b; c -= rot(b,24); \
}
#define rot (   x,
  k 
)    (((x)<<(k)) | ((x)>>(32-(k))))
